processVariable.name: InstanceSummary
instancesStatuses
dataSeriesP

TWComponent.script: tw.local.sqlStatement select distinct LS."NAME" as SnapshotName, LP.SHORT_NAME as ProjectAcronym, LBI.BPD_REF as BPDReferenceID, LBI.TIP as isTip, LBI.BPD_NAME as BPDName, LP.NAME as applicationName, count(DISTINCT LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID) as instanceCount, max(dbms_lob.getlength(LBID."DATA")) as contextSize from lsw_bpd_instance lbi, LSW_PROJECT lp, LSW_SNAPSHOT ls, LSW_BPD_INSTANCE_DATA LBID where LBI.SNAPSHOT_ID = LS.SNAPSHOT_ID and LS.PROJECT_ID = LP.PROJECT_ID and LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID = LBID.BPD_INSTANCE_ID and dbms_lob.getlength(LBID."DATA") > ? group by LS."NAME", LP.SHORT_NAME, LBI.BPD_REF, LBI.TIP, LBI.BPD_NAME, LP.NAME order by count(DISTINCT LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID) DESC

ns17:scriptTask.name: Define SQL
ns17:scriptTask.ns17:script: tw.local.sqlStatement select distinct LS."NAME" as SnapshotName, LP.SHORT_NAME as ProjectAcronym, LBI.BPD_REF as BPDReferenceID, LBI.TIP as isTip, LBI.BPD_NAME as BPDName, LP.NAME as applicationName, count(DISTINCT LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID) as instanceCount, max(dbms_lob.getlength(LBID."DATA")) as contextSize from lsw_bpd_instance lbi, LSW_PROJECT lp, LSW_SNAPSHOT ls, LSW_BPD_INSTANCE_DATA LBID where LBI.SNAPSHOT_ID = LS.SNAPSHOT_ID and LS.PROJECT_ID = LP.PROJECT_ID and LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID = LBID.BPD_INSTANCE_ID and dbms_lob.getlength(LBID."DATA") > ? group by LS."NAME", LP.SHORT_NAME, LBI.BPD_REF, LBI.TIP, LBI.BPD_NAME, LP.NAME order by count(DISTINCT LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID) DESC
